text: CureVac N.V. is a German biopharmaceutical company that creates therapies based on messenger RNA (mRNA). It is headquartered in Tübingen, Germany. The company was founded in 2000 by Ingmar Hoerr (CEO), Steve Pascolo (CSO), Florian von der Mulbe (COO), Günther Jung, and Hans-Georg Rammensee. CureVac had about 240 employees in November 2015. The company's focus is on developing vaccines for infectious diseases and drugs to treat cancer and rare diseases. ==References== Category:Healthcare companies of Germany Category:Baden- Württemberg
title: CureVac
